src:
Em 'Éramos Seis', Maria Eduarda de Carvalho diz que improviso com Sterblitch é a 'cerejinha no bolo'
Trama salta dez anos e mostrará família numerosa de Olga e Zeca
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Karina Matias

São Paulo
text:
In 'We Were Six', Maria Eduarda de Carvalho says that improvising with Sterblitch is the 'cherry on the cake'
Plot jumps ten years and will show large family of Olga and Zeca
02 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Karina Matias

Sao Paulo
